supplierStockouts: Show me all recent delays caused by supplier stockouts
inventoryShortages: Where are we seeing inventory shortages during picking?
warehouseMislocations: Which warehouses have the most stock mislocation problems?
packingErrors: How many wrong items were shipped due to SKU mapping errors?
qualityIssues: Which batches failed quality checks and were returned to manufacturing?
customsHolds: How many shipments are stuck at customs and why?
overshipments: How many times have we shipped more than ordered?
supplierDocumentation: Which suppliers are causing delays due to missing documentation?
